participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, slightly introverted but enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_1.background: My studio is my happy place. My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank. I work for an architect firm. I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, loves to engage in creative activities, but often struggles with self-image issues.
participant_2.background: I get to be creative and have fun with my work. I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss. I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables. I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday. I like to attend wine tours.

content.text: Hey there, nice to meet you! What do you do for work?
Nice to meet you too! I'm a graphic designer, I love getting to be creative and have fun with my work.
That sounds like a really fun job! I work for an architect firm, I love working with my hands and creating things.
Oh cool, do you get to work on a lot of cool projects?
Yeah, we just finished a really cool new house design for a client.
That's awesome! I'd love to see pictures when it's done.
Yeah, I'll send you some when it's done. I'm really excited to see it finished too.
Sounds good! I'm sure it's going to look amazing.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
What are your favorite hobbies?
I love to play the violin and I really enjoy lasagna, like Garfield.
That's awesome! I love lasagna too! I wish I could play the violin, it's such a beautiful instrument.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun to play, but it takes a lot of practice.
Yeah, I'm sure it does. I'm impressed that you can play it so well.
Thanks, I appreciate it!
What other hobbies do you have?
I love to go wine tasting, and I like to attend music festivals.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a wine tasting, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go sometime, it's a lot of fun to try different wines.
Yeah, I'll have to make it a point to do that sometime.
Awesome! I'm sure you'd have a lot of fun.
Yeah, I think I would too.
